mapper.select: SELECT A.ADOPTION_BOARD_NO, A.ADMIN_NO, A.RESCUE_DOG_NO, A.DEL_YN, RD.RESCUE_DOG_NO, RD.IMAGE_NO, RD.DOG_NAME, RD.BREED, CASE WHEN RD.GENDER_MF = 'M' THEN '남아' WHEN RD.GENDER_MF = 'F' THEN '여아' ELSE RD.GENDER_MF END AS GENDER_MF, RD.NEUTERING_OX, RD.AGE, RD.WEIGHT, RD.ADOPTION_COMPLETE_YN, I.IMAGE_PATH FROM ADOPTION_BOARD A JOIN RESCUE_DOG RD ON A.RESCUE_DOG_NO = RD.RESCUE_DOG_NO JOIN IMAGE I ON I.IMAGE_NO = RD.IMAGE_NO WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND RD.ADOPTION_COMPLETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.ENROLL_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM ADOPTION_BOARD A JOIN RESCUE_DOG RD ON A.RESCUE_DOG_NO = RD.RESCUE_DOG_NO WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND RD.ADOPTION_COMPLETE_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE RESCUE_DOG SET ADOPTION_COMPLETE_YN = 'Y' , QUIT_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE RESCUE_DOG_NO = #{rescueDogNo}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ADOPTION_BOARD_NO, A.ADMIN_NO, A.ENROLL_DATE, A.MODIFY_DATE, A.DEL_YN, RD.RESCUE_DOG_NO, RD.IMAGE_NO, RD.DOG_NAME, RD.BREED, CASE WHEN RD.GENDER_MF = 'M' THEN '남아' WHEN RD.GENDER_MF = 'F' THEN '여아' ELSE RD.GENDER_MF END AS GENDER_MF, RD.NEUTERING_OX, RD.AGE, RD.WEIGHT, RD.ADOPTION_COMPLETE_YN, I.IMAGE_PATH FROM ADOPTION_BOARD A JOIN RESCUE_DOG RD ON A.RESCUE_DOG_NO = RD.RESCUE_DOG_NO JOIN IMAGE I ON I.IMAGE_NO = RD.IMAGE_NO WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND RD.ADOPTION_COMPLETE_YN ='N' AND A.ADOPTION_BOARD_NO = #{adoptionBoardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE RESCUE_DOG SET BREED = #{breed}, DOG_NAME = #{dogName}, AGE = #{age}, GENDER_MF = #{genderMf}, NEUTERING_OX = #{neuteringOx}, WEIGHT = #{weight} WHERE RESCUE_DOG_NO = ( SELECT RESCUE_DOG_NO FROM ADOPTION_BOARD WHERE ADOPTION_BOARD_NO = #{adoptionBoardNo} )
UPDATE ADOPTION_BOARD SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE ADOPTION_BOARD_NO = #{adoptionBoardNo}
